description.value:
Receives, validates, and stores a bundle of related Observation, Media, and QuestionnaireResponse.
Supplied Provenance must "target" other resources in same bundle.
--
Supplied Communication must have other resources in same bundle as "topic".
--
This method is intended for uploading single measurements. Uploading large batches of resources is considered misuse.
--
eHealth will implicitly add Provenance resource targetting all resources received in the same measurement bundle.
